summary: Client Sarah initiated a vision meeting. The PM asked for a project name; Architect, Developer, and QA provided no comments.

actions.task: Follow up with Sarah to determine and confirm the project name

risks.risk: No project name was decided during the meeting, which may delay project alignment and kickoff.
risks.mitigation: Assign an owner to propose name options (PM to follow up with Sarah) and schedule a short follow-up to finalize the name.
